content.p: We've interviewed a range of students studying at different levels on different courses, see what they have to say to learn more about life as a student at The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus. Melvin Ling Jia Liang, a year 3 BEng Civil Engineering student shares his experience studying in UNMC and why he has decided to pursue this course. Sylvia Simon, a year 4 MEng Chemical and Environmental Engineering student shares her experience studying in UNMC and why she has decided to pursue this course. Sadaf Hemmati, a year 2 Chemical Engineering student shares his experience studying in UNMC and why he has decided to pursue this course. Matt Trevis-Smith, a year 3 Mechanical Engineering student shares his experience studying in UNMC and why he has decided to pursue this course. Farhana Rahimi, a year 4 Mechatronic Engineering student shares his experience studying in UNMC and why he has decided to pursue this course. Kevin Kana Jacques, a year 2 Business Economics and Management student shares his experience studying in UNMC and why he has decided to pursue this course. Kathleen Kang talks about what she loves about her undergraduate degree with the School of Psychology. Michele Maryann Peter talks about her experience as a postgraduate student with the School of Education and her plans for life after graduation. Tee Choun Zhi talks about his research and work as a PhD student in the Faculty of Engineering. Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia University of Nottingham Malaysia DULN001(B) telephone: +6 03 8924 8000 fax: +6 03 8924 8005 course enquiries: +6 03 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays)
